name: Break Out (abdallah_155)
description:
Genres : Stealth + Puzzle

You are trying to escape a prison without getting caught.

Cut off electricity and use lanterns to finish rooms and reach freedom!

Controls :

Movement : Arrows

Interact : E

Restart Level : R

Go To Main Menu : Esc

Team : 

Game Idea : Muhannad Alaa Alwarawreh

Game Developer & Artist : Abdallah Alaa Alwarawreh

Music & Sounds : Werdom
